mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(idx, title, contents, author_id, author_name, uptime, hits) VALUES(nextval('board_idx_seq'), #{title}, #{contents}, #{author_id}, #{author_name}, now() , 0)
mapper.select: SELECT idx, title, author_name, to_char(uptime, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as uptime, hits FROM board ORDER BY idx ASC

SELECT idx, title, author_name, to_char(uptime, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as uptime, hits FROM board WHERE 1=1
AND title LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%' OR contents LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND ${searchCondition} LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
ORDER BY idx ASC

UPDATE board SET hits = hits + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND idx = #{idx};
